INSERT INTO t_stock_application_out_record ( id, in_record_id, ware_house_id, goods_id, goods_spec_id, count, stock_application_id, price, create_user_id, create_time, box_id, enterprise_id, sort, currency ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.inRecordId}, #{item.wareHouseId}, #{item.goodsId}, #{item.goodsSpecId}, #{item.count}, #{item.stockApplicationId}, #{item.price}, #{item.createUserId}, now(), #{item.boxId}, #{item.enterpriseId}, #{item.sort}, #{item.currency} )
